# PackagePractice

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of PackagePractice is to learn how to develop and ship a package to GitHub.

## Installation

You can install the development version of PackagePractice from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("add-am/PackagePractice")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(PackagePractice)

# basic example code
x <- c("alpha,bravo,charlie,delta")

str_split_one(x, pattern = ",")
str_split_one(x, pattern = ",", n = 2)

```
